newsitem.title: USA: Smith Barney said to start 10 banks.
newsitem.headline: Smith Barney said to start 10 banks.

text.p: -- Smith Barney initiated coverage of 10 banks with outperform and neutral ratings, a market source said.
-- It started First American Corp, Commerce Bancorp Inc, Hibernia Corp and National Commerce Bancorporation with outperform.
-- The source said that Smith Barney initiated Signet Banking Corp, Summit Bancorp, Union Planters Corp, AmSouth Bancorp, Southtrust Corp and First Commerce Corp with neutral.
-- Further details were not immediately available.
